name: NIDA
title: NIDA
description: Concept mapping from content extended codes to NIDA

element.display: Have you used drugs other than those required for medical reasons

target.display: Have you used drugs other than those required for medical reasons

element.display: Do you use more than one drug at a time

target.display: Do you use more than one drug at a time

element.display: Are you always able to stop using drugs when you want to

target.display: Are you always able to stop using drugs when you want to

element.display: Have you had blackouts or flashbacks as a result of drug use

target.display: Have you had blackouts or flashbacks as a result of drug use

element.display: Do you ever feel bad or guilty about your drug use

target.display: Do you ever feel bad or guilty about your drug use

element.display: Does your spouse (or parents) ever complain about your involvement with drugs

target.display: Does your spouse (or parents) ever complain about your involvement with drugs

element.display: Have you neglected your family because of your use of drugs

target.display: Have you neglected your family because of your use of drugs

element.display: Have you engaged in illegal activities in order to obtain drugs

target.display: Have you engaged in illegal activities in order to obtain drugs

element.display: Have you ever experienced withdrawal symptoms (felt sick) when you stopped taking drugs

target.display: Have you ever experienced withdrawal symptoms (felt sick) when you stopped taking drugs

element.display: Have you had medical problems as a result of your drug use (e.g., memory loss, hepatitis, convulsions, bleeding, etc.)

target.display: Have you had medical problems as a result of your drug use (e.g., memory loss, hepatitis, convulsions, bleeding, etc.)
